name: node_modules_rmrf
description: rm -rf specified dir's all node_modules, including all sub directory's node_modules recursively

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig-esm.json
scripts.alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && yarn build && npm publish --tag=alpha
scripts.beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && yarn build && npm publish --tag=beta
scripts.patch:publish: yarn patch && yarn build && npm publish

author: FrankKai
